author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Carmila Issues A 350 Million Bond To Finance Its Growth
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - CARMILA SA:
* CARMILA ISSUES A 350 MILLION BOND TO FINANCE ITS GROWTH * ‍ISSUED TODAY A 10-YEAR EURO 350 MILLION BOND WITH A 2,125% COUPON​
* ‍HAS SUCCESSFULLY ISSUED A 10-YEAR EURO 350 MILLION BOND WITH A 2,125% COUPON​
* ‍BOND ISSUE WAS 2.2 TIMES OVERSUBSCRIBED AND PLACED WITH HIGH-QUALITY LONG-TERM INVESTORS​
* ‍BOND EXTENDS AVERAGE MATURITY OF CARMILA‘S DEBT FROM CURRENT 5.4 YEARS TO 6.0 YEARS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
